tweet: The long awaited #UseBNB update has arrived!  Since we last wrote about #UseBNB on this blog, we’ve increased the number of use cases for $BNB by more than 50%  As always, if there are any missing, let us know in the comments and we will check them out!    https://t.co/VGJta8aauI

In the past 45 days, there are 24 projects issuing on the new Binance Chain (BEP2)  How does that increase the use cases for $BNB?   BNB is the native token of Binance Chain, all transactions involving tokens on the Binance Chain will use #BNB to pay for fees on the network. $BNB  https://t.co/td0pHUGIkt

As we're getting in the game that small caps are moving, I'm reminding you of the following.  When you're trying to buy $BTT, $HOT, $NCASH or $NPXS, use the BNB/ETH/USDT pair.   Ex.:  $BTT buy at 20 sats or 21 sats is 5% difference. In $BNB pair it's <1%.   Also for stop/losses.
